{
    "number": 83691,
    "data": "1,2,6,20,76,296,1240,5200,22960,100512,458592,2064704,9633472,44237440,209780096,977536256,4693031680,22117091840,107211650560,509817656320,2490609167360,11930278307840,58656838113280,282679983493120",
    "name": "Length of list generated by n replacements of k by {-1-|k|, .., 1+|k|} with increment 2, starting with {0}.",
    "comment": [
        "G.f. from SuperSeeker (LISTTOALGEQ) checked up to n=11. Same sequence starting with {1}: see A083692. Sum of absolute values of list elements gives A083693. Cross-references cite sequences with similar generation by integer-substitution and length of resulting lists."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "CoefficientList[InverseSeries[Series[(-4n-5n^2+n^2Sqrt[1+8n+8n^2])/ (2(-2-6n-6n^2-2n^3)), {n, 0, 12}]], n], apart from initial zero."
    ],
    "example": [
        "0, 1 and 2 substitutions produce lengths 1, 2 and 6:",
        "{0}; {-1,1}; {-2,0,2, -2,0,2};"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Table[Length@Flatten[Nest[ #/.k_Integer:>Table[i, {i, -1-Abs[k], Abs[k]+1, 2}]&, {0}, w]], {w, 0, 10}]"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A000108, A001003, A006319."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,2",
    "author": "_Wouter Meeussen_, May 03 2003",
    "references": 2,
    "revision": 5,
    "time": "2012-03-30T18:37:43-04:00",
    "created": "2003-05-16T03:00:00-04:00"
}
